Game Description

The game is a copy of classic FC game, battle city. But being different from it, you don't need to defend your base. As time goes, the enemy will become more and more powerful. You should use more bullets to eliminate them. The more enemies you eliminate, more scores you would get. Enjoy it!

How to Play

Use to move up, move down, move left, move right, respectively. Use spacebar to fire bullet.

Game End

You're defeated!
